name: MIDAS
description: MIDAS is a national research data repository managed by Vilnius University. The aim of MIDAS is to collect, process, store and analyze research data and other relevant information in all fields of knowledge, enabling free, easy and convenient access to the data via the Internet. MIDAS provides services for registered and unregistered users: students, listeners, academics, researchers, scientists, research administrators, other actors of the research and studies ecosystem, and all individuals interested in research data.
